website_summaries.verdict: A basic option that prepares ice for snow cones almost as effectively as costly machines.
pros: Impressive features for an attractive price that includes compact design, adjustable blade for different ice textures, and easy-to-use functions
Won't operate without lid securely in place for added safety
cons: Works best when ice has been at room temperature for a few minutes, which is an inconvenience to some users
Somewhat noisy and not as fast as some of its competitors

customer_reviews.title: Still working 2 years later.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on March 2015 for my wife. She loves plain shaved ice and this provides a nice "snowy" texture that is far better than the ice crushing feature on the fridge. We've been using it 1-2 times each day for 2 years and it's still running great. Lately the ice is slower to come out, so I'll be buying a new replacement blade from their website. Can't recommend this little guy enough. As for noise, yeah...it's about as loud as a normal blender crushing ice. You'll need to talk loudly to anyone nearby so they can hear. But for thirty bucks? Awesome deal.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaReviews

customer_reviews.title: Useful. Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Practical.Useful. Exactly what we were looking for. Great for kids -when they wish to do things themselves- since the blade is somehow out of reach of little hands. Perfect for parties. I consider this an indispensable piece during Summer. Equally great for kids and adults. Today we are putting it to work: Shrimp cocktail on a bed of ice, best margaritas ever, and flavored ice for the kids. (By the way, we are making ice cubes using pureed fruit. Once herdened, they are shaved like usual ice and the kids adore them!)
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids love ice, so I got this as a birthday present. It works really well and makes shaved ice instantly. You don't really have to clean it, since you are just putting ice in it. The unused ice will melt and drip out, so I highly discourage people from putting anything but cubed water in this. I can really see how juice could guck it up. I have had it about two months now and I have had no problems. I really look forward to making some icy treats over the summer.
customer_reviews.author: KStar

customer_reviews.title: Easy fluffy snow cones with regular ice
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost daily to make shaved ice for my coworkers and myself and it works flawlessly. Sometimes I have to shake or tap it to reposition the ice when it gets stuck and ice stops coming out, but it’s an easy fix. I only use regular ice and it comes out light and fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Thompson

customer_reviews.title: We love this machine.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our second machine. My wife and I have a second house in another state and started using our first machine to make snow cones for our grandson. He loved them and we started making one for ourselves. We all got hooked on setting on the back porch on a hot day and eating a snow cone. I have to admit that we have also used it on adult beverages.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C

customer_reviews.title: Makes awesome snow cones.
customer_reviews.text: This snowcone maker is great. It is so easy to use. There are safety features that make me feel comfortable having my grandchildren around while it’s operating. The ice is perfect texture for snow cones. It’s not a storage problem because of its compact size. If you wanted to make more than 2-4 snow cones at a time you might want to consider a bigger unit. But for me and two grandkids it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Cruse

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and easy to use. If you fill it to the top with crushed ice it makes about three bowls of snow cones. Machine is a good size to keep on the kitchen counter all year round. Can’t wait to make margaritas with this for myself!
customer_reviews.author: C Breid

customer_reviews.title: s700 looks the same does not do what my 15+ yr old s500 does
customer_reviews.text: motor runs in reverse from my model 500/-700 motor runs slower an almost slows to a stop Cannot adjust blade noisy my 15+yr old s500 runs faster can make 3 to every one the 700 makes, s500 blade adjusts to snow shaved flakes i tried this s700 an dont know why u would change to 700 when u have the model s500 proven to be perfect would change if i my s500 ever quits guess i may try another brand if i can find another s500 i would buy it
customer_reviews.author: larry r

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is so great! It’s a little noisy, but well worth it for how it shaved the ice! It arrived quickly and my entire family loves it. I even ordered one for my housekeeper because she loved it and she is raising her grandson. Now it’s something they love doing together. I had it shipped to her house and they were so excited! I now have about 15-20 different syrups - I recommend chocolate and coconut! It tastes like an almond joy! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snow cones at home
customer_reviews.text: My daughters ordered this using some of their Christmas money. So far they love it. It is easy to use, makes great snow cones, and is easy to clean. It's small size also makes it easier to store compared to some of the larger snow cone makers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Reichert

customer_reviews.title: Great electronic shaved ice maker
customer_reviews.text: I think this was one of the best purchases for our toddler who loves shaved ice. It's a big upgrade from the hand cranked machines of my childhood. It is loud when it's running, but it crushes ice quickly and the ice has a great consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pregnancy ice cravings
customer_reviews.text: Pregnant lady's relief! I bought this just for the shaved ice which is something I craved heavily while pregnant. I'm not anemic, just a form of pica that comes with some pregnancies and goes away afterwards. The shaved ice felt like I was biting into a snowman! The blade needed no adjustment although out of curiosity I adjusted it anyway which made the ice to larger. I returned it to its original setting and it shaves perfectly. Drink water prior to eating shaved ice so you are sure to remain fully hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Obiageli

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My son and I was given a Hawaiian Shaved Sno Cone machine about 10 years ago for a Christmas present because of love of snow cones. We loved it and still works today just as good as when we got it. For this reason we have also given the same model for gifts to our family and friends because they were always coming over for snow cones. They are not only easy to use and clean, they are so easy to store as well. They last along time and would recommend to anyone. PS I am planning on giving one to my lawn maintenance man for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Salvatore

customer_reviews.title: Working Great! Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Working great. Makes great shaved ice. A little noisy but not bad. Makes a good serving easily. Very easy to clean and care for. One thing: Be advised a tiny sliver of plastic chipped off the very bottom, of the spinner on early use. I think the blade caught a plastic burr on the bottom edge. So make sure there are no burrs left over from the plastic casting. No other issues since.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Martin

customer_reviews.title: Weak and slow
customer_reviews.text: This machine doesn’t have any power and it’s super slow. I purchased one from Walmart a while ago for half of the price and it was very fast and powerful. I wont recommend this machine to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: maveco

customer_reviews.title: Screeching machine
customer_reviews.text: The machine shaved the ice great and I was pleased with the results. However the second time I tried to use it the machine made a very loud screeching noise and would not work. After taking it apart and putting back together it worked good again. The third time I had the same results, the loud screeching and taking apart. I think I will look for another machine. this was not worth my money.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered this and the 900 series to compare and ended up keeping this one. The main reason is because it’s hands free. I can shave a ton of ice in a couple minutes for my kids without having to stand there. The 900 has extremely fine ice like snow but between having to have the molds ready at all times and having to push down pretty hard with both hands, I was much more a fan of the 700 series. Totally worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This ice shaver is a replacement for our old snow come machine. This machine is amazing! The difference between the two is like comparing a toy and a commercial grade unit. This unit really puts out ice fast and shaved perfectly. We could not be any happier!
customer_reviews.author: LGR

customer_reviews.title: Kid Friendly is accurate
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this thing. They make snow cones all the time now and it is easy enough for my kids to use it without supervision.
customer_reviews.author: TheBlueGrassCat

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this ice shaver three or four times now. It is easy to use and shaves ice perfectly. It sure beats the hand-crank type which I have also used. Cannot comment on the durability of it at this point. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P. J.

customer_reviews.title: Used it twice and forgot I had it
customer_reviews.text: The reason why I only used it twice since I bought it was because the ice was not very smooth coming out. It was not what I was expecting for a shaved ice machine. Maybe it was not sharp enough, but I used it twice and left it in my closet until now.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Vo

customer_reviews.title: Can't use circular ice molds only ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: Based on the look of it from pictures I thought I could use the circular ice molds that most shavers use as an option. This doesn't allow; only ice cubes or broken ice as the inside has spiral like propeller that turns when activated to move the ice down to the blade below. You have to continue to add ice and the container doesn't hold too much unlike the mold would. Cheaply made but I guess price comparable to product.
customer_reviews.author: pago

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I love this snow cone maker I have replaced some of eating ice cream with a Sugar Free snow cone. It is fast makes really fine ice. My only complaint is there’s not enough Sugar Free flavors like Pina Colada’s
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have any issues with plastic shavings that other reviews did since I didn’t adjust the blade. Works as promised right out of the box. Got the flavor kit with it and it’s really very good.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I returned this after the first use. The first time I used it you could smell something was hot, like burning wires. PLUS the ice was super coarse. Just not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: The original slices are good too. Looking forward to order another one very ...
customer_reviews.text: Blade could be adjustable to produce a much thinner slice of the ice if possible. The original slices are good too. Looking forward to order another one very soon. Thank you. I am enjoying the crushed ice with our home made syrup and a dash of condenced milk. What a treat when its hot outside. We introduced it to our neighbor and they love it and are thinking about purchasing one too.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Bedasie

customer_reviews.title: Great ice shaver!!!!'
customer_reviews.text: Really hold up well and you can use regular ice put of the freezer. I have had this for over a year now and it still works like new:) You can order replacement parts from Hawaiian ice website (blades, etc...) but I have yet to need any. I really like not having to freeze water in a mold. That's the main reason I bought this, and I think it's great!!! You won't regret buying it. I use it with the Hawaiian ice syrup because I think it taste the best, and I have tried several kinds.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy W. Grandy

customer_reviews.title: Let the kids do it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best birthday present for an 8 year old I ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ohhh the memories...
customer_reviews.text: Brings back memories from when my Mom made Sprite snow cones during the summer. Its identical!! Its so much quieter than it used to be back in the 90s. It makes ice chips, not shaved ice. Excellent and fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great to make shaved ice for Halo Halo
customer_reviews.text: We got this to make Halo halo (Filipino dessert) for a party and it worked really great. Now to see what other ice treats we can make.
customer_reviews.author: RAH

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, is safe enough for my kids to operate. The trick is to let the ice melt for 3-4 minutes before grinding. At the beginning I smelled something from the motor but that has gone away.
customer_reviews.author: brooklynmfs

customer_reviews.title: beats the heat & all the manual ice shavers out there!
customer_reviews.text: we love halo-halo & hawaiian shave ice treats more than ever now coz of this gadget.. my wife introduced the family to this handy ice shaver. we are all very satisfied with the build, quality & most specially the powdery ice it's able to produce. it such a hit around the house during this heatwave in south cali. thank u for making this very affordable unit. it arrived in perfect timing & was well packaged. keep up the good job.. we already recommended this product to friends & relatives.
customer_reviews.author: dF1N15H3r

customer_reviews.title: Snowbody does it better.
customer_reviews.text: Really neat little snow cone maker. Doesn't take up much room on the counter, turns on by twisting the lid. It has a hard time shaving ice if there is only one or two cubes left but it's not really a big deal. Easy to clean because it's just water.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great product Great price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 12 year old as a birthday gift. She loves it and it makes great snow cones. It is professional quality unlike the child snow cone makers you find at the store. We have made many snow cones with it. We also bought the flavors in addition to the snow cone maker. Very great purchase an inexpensive for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Thornton

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful - the ice comes out soft and fluffy. It makes a ton and quickly. I can't believe the price. This is really great - we are thrilled with the purchase. We bought all the snow cone flavors as well and our kids love them. Can't wait for summer when it will be fun to use outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kirwan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Hawaiian Shave Ice/Electric Snow Cone Machine is a splendid little product that I have used several times a day since the package arrived at my door. My nutritionist recommended it to me to help me curb my appetite in the late afternoons. A low cal snow cone is a wonderful treat.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. RLC

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: It is too slow, and although the instructions say one may use their own ice cubes, that is not necessarily true. If your ice tray makes cubes that are on the large side, the shaver has a difficult time eating them up. I had to hammer a few of the ice cubes in order to get the shaver to shave them. And, unfortunately, one of the main reasons I chose this product was because it did not require making any special cubes. I found that this product is definitely frustrating and if you are attempting to create something for more than one person - don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Tendrcare

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for mupurposes
customer_reviews.text: The noise it makes while on a little high pitched
customer_reviews.author: frsun

customer_reviews.title: Great shaved ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Great shaved ice maker. Super easy, not too big, quick shaving. And the Hawaiian syrups are better than others on the market as well. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Super easy, shaves great
customer_reviews.text: makes great shaved ice, and is super easy to use and clean. loses a star for being fairly loud. if you need more than a couple cups worth, it helps to just put a big bowl under it and shave away until you have enough. if you need more than a that, you may want to look at a more powerful unit. this one has a great price though.
customer_reviews.author: PBZ

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST snow cone machine I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST snow cone machine I've ever seen! It literally makes shaved ice like you'd buy from a stand. I have ice cube trays and it works with those cubes. It only takes like 2 ice cubes to make a whole cup. Absolutely love it! Beware that it is a little bit loud though.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Crass

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to empty machine after use to get leftover ice out or it will melt and run out onto counter
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing and exactly what I wanted. The only thing negative I have found is that it doesn't crush the ice up small enough for me. It machine itself is perfect size. It is small enough to be portable and it fits on the kitchen counter as a kitchen appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: delightful!
customer_reviews.text: While in hospital, discovered ice chips as a good way to handle nicotine cravings! This does a good job, too! EAsy to use, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W. Kauffer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is important
customer_reviews.text: What I dislike about the product is that it did not produced the snow like ice that I wanted it it may baby he'll ice Matt snowball ice
customer_reviews.author: Terry Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price range
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price range. Seems to have a problem finishing off the ice cubes I put in it and it has an electrical stench if you run it too long. Still, for the price point, I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We love this product super easy to use and crushed the ice perfect
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth zamudio

customer_reviews.title: Shaved ice
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect so easy my kids can use it. Easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Alexander

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It makes a bowl of shaved iced easily and quickly. I am on my third one over the last 6-7years. I don't want that to deter anyone from buying it as I use it almost daily. Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: More ez
customer_reviews.text: Grandma and grandkids like it and more ez than the one with ice mold that return for this one.
customer_reviews.author: tomma

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh it's okay...
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh it's okay. It's slow. Doesn't hold much ice and it feels pretty cheaply made. It will work fine for me to use occasionally but if you are planning on using it a lot... I'd go with a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Steph-Tn

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to replace another Ice Shaver. It is much sturdier and faster than any in the price range. Also, the safety mechanisms are sound and impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Thyme

customer_reviews.title: ice shaver
customer_reviews.text: Hawaiian shaved ice S700 GREAT GREAT GREAT!!! For the money works really well.. for the dog and me.. Hubby enjoys working the machine. lightweight and easy to clean. Blade replacements are available, but overall can't complain. Love the fluffy ice it makes! Just bought a 2nd one as a back up it is that NICE!!!! Easy to use still love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The machine motor came on but it didn't shave any ice. I took it apart a few times and put it back together but I still couldn't get it to shave the ice even after I let the ice thaw. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited about this snow cone maker because it is super easy to use! However, after a couple of weeks, it started to stop on its own after about 30 seconds and only work again after "resting"for a long time. Now, it is completely dead and we have had it for about 6 weeks! What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Hawaiin Snow Cone Machine 5700 past the time you really want snow cones. But it's great for making drinks too. It's worth the price, now all I have to do is figure out how to make my own syrups of flavors I like for next summer. I was looking for syrups that are like some of the ones I tasted in Hawaii. As another reviewer said it is noisy but its not on for long, I recommend putting a bowl underneath because it works fast.
customer_reviews.author: lily pea

customer_reviews.title: it was pretty awesome and my kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, my kids used this every day. However, it only lasted about 3 months before it broke. :( Before it broke though, it was pretty awesome and my kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my 6 year olds birthday! She was so excited and it’s simple to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Can use regular ice cubes which I like. Have been using it a lot in this hot weather. 4 ice cubes fill a paper cup. My grandsons love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this machine. Had a Hamilton Beach version, but the drive mechanism broke after a few months (did like the two shave options though) and the replacement part I ordered didn't last a month. Haven't had any problems with this one because the design is much sturdier and logical. I don't mind how loud it is because it is so fast at shaving the ice. If you're looking for an ice shaver this is the one to get!
customer_reviews.author: 718Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Loud but works
customer_reviews.text: When I read the reviews that said this machine was a little loud, I thought "well duh", but loud is right. You pretty much have to yell when the machine is on. Other than being very loud, it works great. It took about 2-3 minutes to make one big bowl of ice. My kids love plain shaved ice (no syrup) and this machine saves my arm for making it with the old fashion snoopy one that takes a whole lot longer and a whole lot more energy. I would definately recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy, tasty treats
customer_reviews.text: This thing is loud, but worth it when you're eating snow cones like you're a kid again.
customer_reviews.author: Alec K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I use it to make shaved hot sauce and horseradish sauce for my oysters on the half shell...Love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Carla D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to buy a snow cone machine and decided on the Hawaiian shaved ice. My family and I love it. It's easy to use the ice is shaved perfect, my children are ages 22 months, 7, 14,and 18, and they all love it. Even my husband, who is not a sweets person loves it. He said the ice is what he likes the best.
customer_reviews.author: S Magee

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Item arrived on time and as promised. Keeps myself and my family entertained and hydrated with shaved ice all the time, which is perfect for the summer. Would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids bought this with their own money and they love it! They’ve even added their own flavors such as root beer soda and apple juice !
customer_reviews.author: Jen Wood

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I use this to crush ice for myself to eat. Has been working really well so far. I’ve had it for a short amount of time but I’ve used it so much and no problems to report.
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This ice shaver is very easy to use and a lot of fun for the kids. I bought paper snow-cone cups, straws with little spoons on the end, and Hawaiian brand flavors, and my son and nieces love to make snow-cones! We can have them year-round rather than waiting for summer stands to open up, and the cost of making them is only a fraction of what they cost elsewhere. Overall, the machine is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiny Sarradet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desert!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Great desert for a hot summer night. I’m an adult and love this machine!
customer_reviews.author: rimazima

customer_reviews.title: Snow Cone Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: Received my snow cone machine promptly and it works great, as advertised and intended. Turned regular ice cubes from my refrigerator into finely-shaved ice in seconds. I'm completely satisfied with this purchase and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Charlyn J. Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could have hoped
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Very easy to use. Couldn’t ask for more and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Jesspkt

customer_reviews.title: Safety?
customer_reviews.text: Started cutting into the part of the machine and putting small plastic slivers in the slushies. It would be nice to be able to adjust the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Truscott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was for my grandaughter & she loved it. It works very well & is just what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: The pictures show snow cone flavorings with the machine. Talk about false advertising!!! Imagine my granddaughter’s dismay and disappointment when there were no flavored syrups and we had to try to find them elsewhere. Horrible gift and not good idea for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product was great but broke after 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Loza

customer_reviews.title: It's SNOW Problem
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembly, easy to use. Looks like you will have to eventually change the blade for the machine. (based on my Amazon recommendation) Makes snow-cone fast, now I get a tasty treat at my convince.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: So I'm happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is my little Nephew loves it! He operates it very well. He's 8. So I'm happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: LaceyAutum

customer_reviews.title: Good Ice Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Very good ice shaver machine. Easy to handle and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this Hawaiian Shaved Ice snow cone machine is exactly what ...
customer_reviews.text: this Hawaiian Shaved Ice snow cone machine is exactly what I wanted. It works perfectly! Be sure to buy a snow cone syrup kit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Curtscook

customer_reviews.title: wonderful for snow cones
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Made fluffy shaved ice for snow cones, they were delicious. Make sure you have plenty of ice for a large group. Very happy with mine, don't miss having to freeze specific containers for the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The machine came as advertised. It is really easy to use and the shaved ice comes out great. Excellent machine. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: G Riem

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It works like a charm. My 6 year old son operates this with ease without supervision. It's safe and straight foward Very handy
customer_reviews.author: T'Sana Wint

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Grandkids love it! Great Hawaiian style ice.
customer_reviews.author: Devon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and got here super fast !!! It got here more then a week earlier then it said it was going to take.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit. Shaves ice very fine. Not a New Orleans Snowball fine but outside of that it is a great buy. You must spend hundreds for a commercial Sno-Wizard Snowball machine. For a home ice shaver this unit is great. Will enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: George Rowley Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Good machine to make margaritas
customer_reviews.text: Good machine to make margaritas. I fill a big solo cup (16-18 oz?) with ice cubes (8-10) then fill the machine. Set the solo cup under the spout turn it on til it fills solo cup. Then quickly turn the filled solo cup upside down emptying into margarita glass, pour mix over the ice in the salt rimmed glass, and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Crib

customer_reviews.title: Shaved ice, and plastic too
customer_reviews.text: The second time I used this the blade somehow ended up chipping off plastic and it got into the ice. They were very good about returning it, but I was disappointed and now have a lot of syrup and nothing to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews trying to buy the right machine as I like the very fine ice shaved for loaded snow cones. This is definintely powdery and fine. Make a small pile then put a scoop of ice cream and then more ice on top and then your favorite syrup.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great at first.....
customer_reviews.text: ....but just like others have mentioned, it doesn't last long. Mine only lasted 2 years then the motor started making an EXTREMELY loud noise and you can smell it burning. When it worked it was GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: T Phan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine. Just one comment: Ice is not small enough. Maybe I just need more practice.
customer_reviews.author: Pat's Angel

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great product my kids love it, just let the ice sit for a sec and start it.
customer_reviews.author: Twin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. However you have tone very careful when emptying the leftover ice. That blade is sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Davetta Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and inexpensive solution to making your own shaved ice. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dorisa

customer_reviews.title: Small ,but works as long as you don't have a bunch of kids or grandkids at once
customer_reviews.text: Was smaller than I thought it would be! But it works for the kids and grandkids
customer_reviews.author: Greatful Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought this years ago!! Awesome product , kids love it! Easy to use, any ice, does not need special mold for ice.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Simple but Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, in the hot weather currently i'm making snow cones every day, i think this might be the best thing i've bought off amazon in the last few years!
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after a few uses. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really fine ice
customer_reviews.text: Very fine ice. At first we didn't like it as much as our old Rival as it shaves the ice very finely but now we love it. Greatest feature is that you can load it and walk away.
customer_reviews.author: S. Back

customer_reviews.title: ) WOULD RECOMMEND AND WOULD BUY
customer_reviews.text: MY SECOND PURCHASE OF THIS UNIT. YOU HAVE TO UNDERSTAND WHY...I EAT APPROXIMATELY 10 TO 20 LBS OF ICE ALMOST DAILY. THIS UNIT IN ONE YEAR HAS PROBABLY SHAVED 100'S OF POUNDS OF ALL TYPES OF ICE. I PUT THE OLD ONE AWAY FOR EMERGENCIES (ALWAYS GOTTA HAVE 2 MACHINES ON HAND.) WOULD RECOMMEND AND WOULD BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Melody L. Leming

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great ice shaver! Easy to use, fast results under a minute it makes a cup full of shaved ice. Perfect for Filipino dessert “halo-halo”
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: Good machine, I purchased basd upon reviews. Has lasted 2 years of intermittent use and no issues. Chops ice well and quickly. Is loud, but anything that cuts ice seems to be. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: CW

product_meta.title: Hawaiian Shaved Ice Kid-Friendly Snow Cone Machine, 120V, White
product_meta.description: Make your next birthday party a hit and whip-up snow cones for all of the party guests with this home-use electric snow cone machine by Hawaiian Shaved Ice. This snow cone maker shaves regular bagged ice or ice cubes you would get out of your freezer. The kids can make snow cones for all of their friends, and Mom & Dad can make frozen cocktails for all of theirs. This kid-friendly Hawaiian snow cone machine is fun and easy-to-use. Simply remove the lid and place ice into the hopper. Then, replace and turn the lid to engage the motor. An added safety feature prevents the machine from operating when the lid is off, making it a kid-safe appliance. However, we do recommend adult supervision because of the shaver blade. This attractively designed snow cone machine makes it a great looking kitchen countertop appliance. However, because of the machine's design, it can be quickly disassembled for easy storage in a cabinet or pantry. The S700 machine plugs directly into a household electric outlet (120V) and features an adjustable stainless-steel blade. Hawaiian Shaved Ice S700 Snow Cone Machine Specifications Electrical: 120V, 55W Assembled Dimensions: 6. 5” W x 10. 5” D x 11” H Adjustable Stainless Steel Blade BPA Free The Hawaiian Shaved Ice snow cone maker is sure to liven up your next luau-themed party. It brings smiles to both the young and old as it produces an icy treat that can be enjoyed by all generations. Make tasty snowballs in no time with this snow cone machine. Order yours today! And, be sure to pair this with Hawaiian Shaved Ice brand snow cone syrup!
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: Home-use, kid-friendly electric S700 snow cone machine with a 1-year manufacturer’s warranty
USAGE: Great for making snow cones, snowballs, slushies, frozen cocktails, and much more
SIMPLE-TO-USE: Prepare cool treats quickly at sleepovers, small pool parties, birthday parties, and other family and friend get-togethers
COMPACT: 6.5” wide, 10.5” diameter, and 10.12” tall – which makes it easy to tuck under the counter or in a cabinet
INSTRUCTIONS: Always remember to read and follow the instructions in the owner’s manual for use and operation
